content:
Update Your Einstein Classification Model

Update an active Einstein classification model to add or remove fields, change which cases it applies to, or adjust field prediction settings.

Einstein Case Classification is available in Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience. Setup for Einstein Case Classification is available only in Lightning Experience.

Available in: Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions.

TO UPDATE A MODEL:
Pause and reactivate predictions.
Turn on predictions for a new field by pausing the model, editing fields, adding new ones, selecting next and finish, rebuilding and reactivating.
Turn off predictions for a field by removing it from the model, rebuilding and reactivating.
Change prediction settings by configuring automated field predictions.
Change which cases receive predictions or learn from by defining segment criteria, pausing, editing data, selecting yes to use all case data or no to focus on a segment with filter criteria, rebuilding and reactivating.
title: Update Einstein Classification Model in Service Cloud
